Metadata: Sea urchin fisheries: a California perspective
"Sea Urchins: Fisheries and Ecology," Proceedings of the International Conference on Sea-urchin Fisheries and Aquaculture 2003, pp. 37-55, Puerto Varas, Chile, March 25- 27, 2003.

Fishery agencies encouraged urchin fishing in the early 1970s in California and the fishery peaked in the 1980s. The author of this paper presents a concise description of the ecology of the red sea urchin "Strongylocentrâ€‹otus franciscanus" and the California coastal environment. A summary of the fishery, its management, and current status follows, plus a discussion of future management strategies.
